title: crispy chickpeas
ingredients: 2 cans chickpeas; drained and rinsed and pat dry
spices; omit salt if using a blend like lowry's
instructions: Lay parchment on baking sheet. Can do all on one half sheet or do two different splice blends on two quarter sheets.
Mix chickpeas with oil and spices on the tray then disperse in a single layer.
Bake for 20 minutes; shaking once halfway through. Cook longer if not crispy enough.
notes: Should be stored in a loosely covered container for a couple days. Other spice mixtures we've tried: curry powder/garam masala, cumin and smoked paprika.
